item.title: Ansible Meetup
item.description: Topics that will be covered Introduction to Ansible. Overview of Ansible Architecture and Basic modules. Overview and demo of Ansible Tower. Ansible in Real Life. Pros and Cons of Ansible vs Other Configuration management tools. Workshop Goal Get Hands on Ansible playbooks and know Ansible Tower Deploy Coming Soon Conclusion Coming Soon
